overview: When you throw Bonnie Rotten, the 2014 Female Performer of the Year in a room full of runner ups ... things get a bit catty! These hot tattooed bitches wanna bring her back down to Earth GANGBANG STYLE! Will these tool wielding wenches break her ego down, or will Bonnie show them why she is the ultimate squirting fuck slut around? Either way we all win as we watch them try to destroy her. Somebody grab a mop!
title: The Destruction of Bonnie Rotten
